alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Coleman; Runnels; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 12:35AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Callahan, northwestern Coleman, Taylor and northeastern Runnels Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1235 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tuscola, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Winters, Wylie, Merkel, Tye, Tuscola, Buffalo Gap, Lawn, Novice, View, Bradshaw, Coronados Camp, Silver Valley, Crews, Oplin, Caps, Dyess Afb, Lake Abilene, Camp Tonkawa and Lake Coleman. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 266 and 279. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Texas.
